transcript.title: Statement from the Prime Minister's Press Office
transcript.content:
From a spokesperson for the Prime Minister:

During national security briefings, Commonwealth security officials informed the Prime Minister that the National Police Reference System (the database administered by CrimTrac that holds all state and territory police records) indicated that the perpetrator of the Martin Place siege had been a recorded firearms licence holder within the jurisdiction of NSW.Â 

The AFP Commissioner is investigating the origins of the entry on the National Police Reference System.
